Title: The Challenger's Ring: Hawkmaster Nurong
Description:
You've really been building up respect with the Shado-Pan, $n.

Nurong's interested in trying out his skills against you.

The good news is, if you win, I'll allow him to go with you on your missions.

The bad news is, I really don't think you'll win.
ObjectivesText: Challenge Hawkmaster Nurong, and then defeat him in combat at Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
PortraitGiverText: A deadly Wu Kao who always travels with his beloved hawk, Whitefeather.
